mapper.update: update w_order set order_user_id = #{orderUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, order_ad_id = #{orderAdId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, order_pay_id = #{orderPayId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, order_number = #{orderNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_delivery_status = #{orderDeliveryStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, order_found_time = #{orderFoundTime,jdbcType=DATE}, order_payment_time = #{orderPaymentTime,jdbcType=DATE}, order_shipments_time = #{orderShipmentsTime,jdbcType=DATE}, order_receiving_time = #{orderReceivingTime,jdbcType=DATE}, order_freight = #{orderFreight,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, order_actual_payment = #{orderActualPayment,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select order_id, order_user_id, order_ad_id, order_pay_id, order_number, order_delivery_status, order_found_time, order_payment_time, order_shipments_time, order_receiving_time, order_freight, order_actual_payment from w_order where order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select order_id, order_user_id, order_ad_id, order_pay_id, order_number, order_delivery_status, order_found_time, order_payment_time, order_shipments_time, order_receiving_time, order_freight, order_actual_payment from w_order
